channel.title: Droid App
channel.description: Anyone who uses moparsape on their phone knows smf's mobile support is shit. So I got to thinking.. who would support an app for moparscape? At first id start with an apk but if its a succes on the droid I could develop an app for ipa, ipod and iphone.

item.title: Droid App
item.dc:creator: @eballer48 eballer48
item.description:
@eballer48 wrote:

[quote=“John459, post:15, topic:414549”][quote author=eballer48 link=topic=516515.msg3751174#msg3751174 date=1316043905]

‘Apps’ for websites are a stupid idea all together. If you don’t like the mobile theme (I’m not a huge fan), either suggest or write a better one, that way it works on all phones and all browsers with no install or configuration mess. That’s the whole purpose of the world wide web, to be cross-platform and browser-agnostic.

Well I could suggest it, but im only one person. Why would smf listen to me?
[/quote]

smf doesn’t need to listen to you. You can create a theme yourself.[/quote]

:fp: thought he was suggesting i tell smf to write a better mobile theme.

Read full topic

item.title: Droid App
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

[quote=“eballer48, post:14, topic:414549”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=516515.msg3750470#msg3750470 date=1315980318]
‘Apps’ for websites are a stupid idea all together. If you don’t like the mobile theme (I’m not a huge fan), either suggest or write a better one, that way it works on all phones and all browsers with no install or configuration mess. That’s the whole purpose of the world wide web, to be cross-platform and browser-agnostic.
[/quote]

Well I could suggest it, but im only one person. Why would smf listen to me?[/quote]

smf doesn’t need to listen to you. You can create a theme yourself.

Read full topic

item.title: Droid App
item.dc:creator: @eballer48 eballer48

Moparisthebest:

‘Apps’ for websites are a stupid idea all together. If you don’t like the mobile theme (I’m not a huge fan), either suggest or write a better one, that way it works on all phones and all browsers with no install or configuration mess. That’s the whole purpose of the world wide web, to be cross-platform and browser-agnostic.

Well I could suggest it, but im only one person. Why would smf listen to me?

item.title: Droid App
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

I use the mobile theme on my BB and it really is awful… It also offers very little administration features which is a real downside for me. Oh, and it doesn’t show images in posts, just white space which is also really irritating!

Read full topic

item.title: Droid App
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

‘Apps’ for websites are a stupid idea all together. If you don’t like the mobile theme (I’m not a huge fan), either suggest or write a better one, that way it works on all phones and all browsers with no install or configuration mess. That’s the whole purpose of the world wide web, to be cross-platform and browser-agnostic.

Read full topic

item.title: Droid App
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

i thought i was the only one that had trouble. with the current mobile version i have to click the title of a thread like 3 times for it to redirect to that thread. i dont have any trouble navigating the different boards its just going to a thread… i have no idea why that is but it would have to be the mobile site right? i dont have any trouble on any other site.

idk if u really need an app though. i think a good functioning web interface is the way to go. u can have phone apps that just view webpages so ya.

Read full topic

item.title: Droid App
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

I’m down for a mobile app. The web version sucks. Viewing is hard on my mobile phone, and with an app it would be fairly easy. As long as it’s a decent app.

Read full topic
